title: Designing SpeechActs: issues in speech user interfaces
proctitle: CHI '95: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: Nicole Yankelovich
authors.institution: Sun Microsystems Laboratories, Two Elizabeth Drive, Chelmsford, MA

authors.name: Gina-Anne Levow
authors.institution: Sun Microsystems Laboratories, Two Elizabeth Drive, Chelmsford, MA

references.text: Clark, Herbert H. Arenas of Language Use. University of Chicago Press, Chicago, IL, 1992.
Grice, H. P. "Logic and Conversation," Syntax and Semantics: Speech Acts, Cole & Morgan, editors, Volume 3, Academic Press, 1975.
Grosz, Barbara, and Candy Sidner. "Attention, Intentions, and the Structure of Discourse," Computational Linguistics, Volume 12, No. 3, 1986.
Kamm, Candace. "User Interfaces for Voice Applications," Voice Communication Between Humans and Machines, National Academy Press, Washington, DC, 1994.

Kitai, Mikia, A. Imamura, and Y. Suzuki. "Voice Activated Interaction System Based on HMM-based Speaker-Independent Word Spotting," Proceedings of the Voice I/O Systems Applications Conference, Atlanta, GA, September 1991.
Ly, Eric, and Chris Schmandt. "Chatter: A Conversational Learning Speech Interface," AAAI Spring Symposium on Intelligent Multi-Media Multi-Modal Systems, Stanford, CA, March 1994.

Martin, Paul and Andrew Kehler. "SpeechActs: A Testbed for Continuous Speech Applications," AAAI- 94 Workshop on the Integration of Natural Language and Speech Processing, 12th National Conference on AI, Seattle, WA, July 31-August 1, 1994.
Nielsen, Jakob. "The Usability Engineering Life Cycle," IEEE Computer, March 1992.
Roe, David, and Jay Wilpon, editors. Voice Communication Between Humans and Machines, National Academy Press, Washington, DC, 1994.
Schmandt, Chris. Voice Communication with Computers: Conversational Systems, Van Nostrand Reinhold, New York, 1994.

Stifelman, Lisa, Barry Arons, Chris Schmandt, and Eric Hulteen, "VoiceNotes: A Speech Interface for a Hand-Held Voice Notetaker, ACM INTERCHI `93 Conference Proceedings, Amsterdam, The Netherlands, April 24-29, 1993.
Yankelovich, Nicole. "Talking vs. Taking: Speech Access to Remote Computers," ACM CHI `94 Conference Companion, Boston, MA, April 24-28, 1994.
Yankelovich, Nicole and Eric Baatz. "SpeechActs: A Framework for Building Speech Applications," AVIOS `94 Conference Proceedings, San Jose, CA, September 20-23, 1994.
